about.ourStoryDesc1: Fundado con la visi√≥n de revolucionar el comercio global de frutas y verduras, Fruit Habibi surgi√≥ de la comprensi√≥n de que los productos de calidad merecen conexiones de calidad.

terms.title: [ES] Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: [ES] Please read these terms carefully before using our B2B marketplace platform. By using our services, you agree to be bound by these terms.
terms.welcomeDesc: [ES] These Terms of Service govern your use of our premium B2B marketplace platform that connects fruit and vegetable growers with buyers worldwide. We're committed to providing a secure, transparent, and efficient trading environment for all our users.
terms.questionsDesc: [ES] If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact our legal team. We're here to help clarify any concerns you may have.
terms.section1Content:
[ES] By accessing and using Fruit Habibi ("the Platform"), you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of our B2B marketplace platform that connects premium fruit and vegetable growers with trusted buyers worldwide. By creating an account or using our services, you agree to these terms.
terms.section2Content:
[ES] Fruit Habibi provides a digital marketplace platform that enables:

‚Ä¢ Product listing and discovery services
‚Ä¢ Secure payment processing with escrow protection
‚Ä¢ Communication tools between buyers and sellers
‚Ä¢ Quality verification and dispute resolution
‚Ä¢ International shipping coordination
‚Ä¢ Business verification and trust scoring

We act as an intermediary platform and do not directly sell or purchase products listed by users.
terms.section3Content:
[ES] To use our platform, you must:

‚Ä¢ Provide accurate and complete business information
‚Ä¢ Maintain the security of your account credentials
‚Ä¢ Complete business verification process
‚Ä¢ Comply with all applicable laws and regulations

We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms or engage in fraudulent activities. Business verification is required for all sellers and recommended for buyers.

You are responsible for all activities that occur under your account and must notify us immediately of any unauthorized use.
terms.section4Content:
[ES] Users are strictly prohibited from:

‚Ä¢ Listing counterfeit, illegal, or prohibited products
‚Ä¢ Providing false or misleading product information
‚Ä¢ Attempting to circumvent our payment system
‚Ä¢ Engaging in fraudulent transactions
‚Ä¢ Violating intellectual property rights
‚Ä¢ Harassment or abuse of other users
‚Ä¢ Manipulating reviews or ratings
‚Ä¢ Using automated systems to access the platform
‚Ä¢ Selling products outside of permitted categories

Violations may result in immediate account suspension and legal action.
terms.section5Content:
[ES] Payment Terms:

‚Ä¢ All transactions are processed through our secure escrow system
‚Ä¢ Platform fee: 3% of transaction value (2.5% for verified premium sellers)
‚Ä¢ Payment processing fees may apply
‚Ä¢ Refunds are subject to our dispute resolution process

Buyers pay upfront, and sellers receive payment after successful delivery confirmation. We hold funds in escrow to protect both parties during the transaction.

All fees are clearly displayed before transaction completion. Currency conversion rates apply for international transactions.
terms.section6Content:
[ES] Dispute Process:

1. Direct Communication: Users must attempt to resolve issues directly first
2. Platform Mediation: Our team will mediate if direct resolution fails
3. Evidence Review: Both parties must provide relevant documentation
4. Resolution Timeline: Standard disputes resolved within 7 business days
5. Appeal Process: Users can appeal decisions within 48 hours

We reserve the right to:
‚Ä¢ Issue full or partial refunds
‚Ä¢ Suspend accounts during investigation
‚Ä¢ Adjust trust scores based on dispute outcomes
‚Ä¢ Escalate to legal authorities for serious violations

Our decision is binding unless overturned through the appeal process.
terms.section7Content:
[ES] Intellectual Property Rights:

‚Ä¢ Users retain ownership of their product listings and content
‚Ä¢ Users grant us license to display and promote their content on the platform
‚Ä¢ We own all platform technology, design, and proprietary systems
‚Ä¢ Trademark infringement is strictly prohibited
‚Ä¢ Users must have rights to all images and content they upload

We respect intellectual property rights and will remove infringing content upon notification. Users who repeatedly infringe on IP rights may have their accounts terminated.
terms.section8Content:
[ES] Data Protection:

‚Ä¢ We collect and process data as described in our Privacy Policy
‚Ä¢ User data is protected with industry-standard security measures
‚Ä¢ We may share data with trusted partners for service delivery
‚Ä¢ Users can request data deletion subject to legal requirements
‚Ä¢ International data transfers comply with applicable regulations

By using our platform, you consent to our data collection and processing practices. We are committed to protecting your privacy and maintaining data security.
terms.section9Content:
[ES] Liability Limitations:

‚Ä¢ Our platform is provided "as is" without warranties
‚Ä¢ We are not liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages
‚Ä¢ Our total liability is limited to fees paid to us in the preceding 12 months
‚Ä¢ We do not guarantee uninterrupted or error-free service
‚Ä¢ Users are responsible for their own business decisions

We act as an intermediary platform and are not responsible for:
‚Ä¢ Product quality or condition
‚Ä¢ Delivery delays or issues
‚Ä¢ Business disputes between users
‚Ä¢ Third-party service failures

Users participate at their own risk and should conduct due diligence.
terms.section10Content:
[ES] Account Termination:

We may suspend or terminate accounts for:
‚Ä¢ Violation of these Terms of Service
‚Ä¢ Fraudulent or illegal activities
‚Ä¢ Non-payment of fees
‚Ä¢ Misrepresentation of business information
‚Ä¢ Harassment of other users

Users may terminate their accounts at any time by contacting support. Upon termination:
‚Ä¢ Active transactions must be completed
‚Ä¢ Outstanding fees must be paid
‚Ä¢ Account data may be retained for legal compliance
‚Ä¢ User content may be removed from public view
terms.section11Content:
[ES] Global Trade Requirements:

‚Ä¢ Users must comply with all applicable international trade laws
‚Ä¢ Export/import regulations must be followed
‚Ä¢ Sanctions and embargo restrictions apply
‚Ä¢ Customs documentation is user responsibility
‚Ä¢ We may restrict transactions based on compliance requirements

Users are responsible for:
‚Ä¢ Obtaining necessary permits and licenses
‚Ä¢ Complying with destination country regulations
‚Ä¢ Accurate customs declarations
‚Ä¢ Payment of applicable duties and taxes

We reserve the right to block transactions that may violate trade laws.
terms.section12Content:
[ES] Modifications:

‚Ä¢ We may update these Terms of Service from time to time
‚Ä¢ Users will be notified of significant changes via email
‚Ä¢ Continued use constitutes acceptance of new terms
‚Ä¢ Users may terminate accounts if they disagree with changes
‚Ä¢ Previous versions are available upon request

Changes may be made to:
‚Ä¢ Reflect new services or features
‚Ä¢ Comply with legal requirements
‚Ä¢ Improve user experience
‚Ä¢ Address security concerns

We encourage users to review terms periodically.

sellerOnboarding.onboardingCompleteDesc: [ES] You're all set to start selling on Fruit Habibi. Your seller account is now active.

help.faqGettingStartedQ1: [ES] How do I create an account?
help.faqGettingStartedA1: [ES] Click 'Create Account' on our homepage, fill in your business details, and verify your email. Complete your profile to start listing or purchasing products.
help.faqGettingStartedQ2: [ES] What information do I need to verify my account?
help.faqGettingStartedA2: [ES] We require business registration documents, tax identification, and contact information. For sellers, we also need quality certifications and shipping capabilities.
help.faqGettingStartedQ3: [ES] How long does account verification take?
help.faqGettingStartedA3: [ES] Standard verification takes 1-3 business days. Premium verification with priority support takes 24 hours.
help.faqBuyingSellingQ1: [ES] How does the payment system work?
help.faqBuyingSellingA1: [ES] We use secure escrow payments. Funds are held until delivery confirmation. Buyers pay upfront, and sellers receive payment after successful delivery.
help.faqBuyingSellingA2: [ES] We charge a 3% commission on successful transactions. Premium sellers (verified businesses) get reduced fees of 2.5%.
help.faqBuyingSellingQ3: [ES] How do I list my products?
help.faqBuyingSellingA3: [ES] Go to your dashboard, click 'Create Listing', upload high-quality images, add detailed descriptions, set pricing, and specify shipping options.
help.faqBuyingSellingA4: [ES] Yes! Use our messaging system to negotiate with buyers/sellers directly. Final prices are updated before payment processing.
help.faqShippingA1: [ES] Sellers specify shipping methods and costs. We partner with global logistics providers for international shipping with tracking.
help.faqShippingQ2: [ES] What if my product arrives damaged?
help.faqShippingA2: [ES] Report damage within 48 hours of delivery. We'll initiate a dispute resolution process and may provide refunds or replacements.
help.faqShippingA3: [ES] Yes! We facilitate global trade with customs documentation, international shipping partners, and compliance with local regulations.
help.faqSafetyA1: [ES] We verify business licenses, tax documents, quality certifications, and conduct background checks. Verified sellers get special badges.
help.faqSafetyQ2: [ES] What if a seller doesn't deliver?
help.faqSafetyA2: [ES] Our dispute resolution system handles non-delivery cases. You can get full refunds and we take action against problematic sellers.
help.faqSafetyA3: [ES] Absolutely. We use bank-level encryption, PCI DSS compliance, and never store your full payment details on our servers.
help.faqTechnicalA1: [ES] Try resetting your password or contact support. We'll verify your identity and restore access within 24 hours.
help.faqTechnicalA2: [ES] Check your internet connection and clear browser cache. If issues persist, contact our technical support team.
help.faqTechnicalQ3: [ES] How do I update my business information?
help.faqTechnicalA3: [ES] Go to your profile settings, update your information, and submit for re-verification if you've changed business details.

privacy.title: [ES] Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: [ES] Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information on our B2B marketplace platform.
privacy.welcomeDesc: [ES] At Fruit Habibi, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains our practices regarding the collection, use, and protection of information when you use our B2B marketplace platform. We believe in transparency and giving you control over your personal data.
privacy.questionsDesc: [ES] If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or how we handle your personal information, please don't hesitate to contact our privacy team. We're here to help.
privacy.section1Content:
[ES] Personal Information:

‚Ä¢ Business contact information (name, email, phone, address)
‚Ä¢ Business registration and tax identification details
‚Ä¢ Payment and banking information (processed securely)
‚Ä¢ Identity verification documents
‚Ä¢ Product listings and descriptions
‚Ä¢ Communication records with other users

Technical Information:

‚Ä¢ IP addresses and device information
‚Ä¢ Browser type and version
‚Ä¢ Usage patterns and platform interactions
‚Ä¢ Cookies and similar tracking technologies
‚Ä¢ Location data (if provided or detected)

We collect this information to provide our services, verify identities, process transactions, and improve our platform functionality.
privacy.section2Content:
[ES] Service Provision:

‚Ä¢ Creating and maintaining your account
‚Ä¢ Processing transactions and payments
‚Ä¢ Facilitating communication between users
‚Ä¢ Providing customer support
‚Ä¢ Verifying business credentials

Platform Improvement:

‚Ä¢ Analyzing usage patterns to improve services
‚Ä¢ Developing new features and functionality
‚Ä¢ Conducting research and analytics
‚Ä¢ Personalizing user experience
‚Ä¢ Preventing fraud and abuse

Legal Compliance:

‚Ä¢ Meeting regulatory requirements
‚Ä¢ Responding to legal requests
‚Ä¢ Protecting our rights and interests
‚Ä¢ Ensuring platform security
‚Ä¢ Maintaining transaction records

We use your information only for legitimate business purposes and in compliance with applicable laws.
privacy.section3Content:
[ES] We may share your information in the following circumstances:

With Other Users:
‚Ä¢ Business contact information for transaction purposes
‚Ä¢ Product listings and descriptions
‚Ä¢ Public profile information (if you choose to make it public)

With Service Providers:
‚Ä¢ Payment processors for transaction handling
‚Ä¢ Shipping and logistics partners
‚Ä¢ Cloud storage and hosting providers
‚Ä¢ Customer support tools
‚Ä¢ Analytics and marketing services

Legal Requirements:
‚Ä¢ When required by law or legal process
‚Ä¢ To protect our rights and property
‚Ä¢ In case of emergency to protect safety
‚Ä¢ To comply with government requests

Business Transfers:
‚Ä¢ In case of merger, acquisition, or sale of assets
‚Ä¢ With your explicit consent for other purposes

We never sell your personal information to third parties for marketing purposes.
privacy.section4Content:
[ES] Security Measures:

‚Ä¢ Encryption of data in transit and at rest
‚Ä¢ Secure servers with regular security updates
‚Ä¢ Access controls and authentication systems
‚Ä¢ Regular security audits and assessments
‚Ä¢ Employee training on data protection

Technical Safeguards:

‚Ä¢ SSL/TLS encryption for all communications
‚Ä¢ Multi-factor authentication for sensitive operations
‚Ä¢ Regular backup and disaster recovery procedures
‚Ä¢ Intrusion detection and prevention systems
‚Ä¢ Secure coding practices and vulnerability testing

Data Breach Response:

‚Ä¢ Immediate investigation and containment
‚Ä¢ Notification to affected users within 72 hours
‚Ä¢ Cooperation with law enforcement if required
‚Ä¢ Implementation of additional security measures
‚Ä¢ Regular updates on resolution progress

While we implement industry-standard security measures, no system is 100% secure. We continuously work to improve our security practices.
privacy.section5Content:
[ES] Retention Periods:

Account Information:
‚Ä¢ Active accounts: Retained while account is active
‚Ä¢ Closed accounts: Retained for 7 years for legal compliance
‚Ä¢ Suspended accounts: Retained until resolution or permanent closure

Transaction Data:
‚Ä¢ Payment records: 7 years for tax and legal compliance
‚Ä¢ Communication logs: 3 years for dispute resolution
‚Ä¢ Product listings: Until account closure or removal

Technical Data:
‚Ä¢ Log files: 1 year for security and performance monitoring
‚Ä¢ Analytics data: 2 years for platform improvement
‚Ä¢ Cookies: As specified in our cookie policy

Legal Requirements:

‚Ä¢ Financial records: 7 years minimum
‚Ä¢ Identity verification: 5 years after account closure
‚Ä¢ Legal proceedings: Until resolution plus applicable statute of limitations

You may request deletion of certain personal information, subject to legal and operational requirements.
privacy.section6Content:
[ES] Your Rights:

Access and Portability:
‚Ä¢ Request copies of your personal information
‚Ä¢ Receive data in a portable format
‚Ä¢ Understand how we use your information

Correction and Updates:
‚Ä¢ Correct inaccurate personal information
‚Ä¢ Update your account information
‚Ä¢ Modify your privacy preferences

Deletion and Restriction:
‚Ä¢ Request deletion of personal information
‚Ä¢ Restrict processing of your data
‚Ä¢ Object to certain data processing activities

Communication Preferences:
‚Ä¢ Opt out of marketing communications
‚Ä¢ Choose notification preferences
‚Ä¢ Manage cookie settings

How to Exercise Your Rights:

‚Ä¢ Contact us through our support channels
‚Ä¢ Use account settings for basic preferences
‚Ä¢ Submit formal requests for complex changes
‚Ä¢ Provide identification for security verification

We will respond to your requests within 30 days, subject to verification and legal requirements.
privacy.section7Content:
[ES] Global Operations:

‚Ä¢ Our platform serves users worldwide
‚Ä¢ Data may be transferred across international borders
‚Ä¢ We ensure adequate protection for all transfers

Transfer Mechanisms:

‚Ä¢ Standard Contractual Clauses (SCCs)
‚Ä¢ Adequacy decisions by relevant authorities
‚Ä¢ Binding Corporate Rules where applicable
‚Ä¢ User consent for specific transfers

Regional Compliance:

European Union (GDPR):
‚Ä¢ Full compliance with GDPR requirements
‚Ä¢ Data Protection Officer appointed
‚Ä¢ Privacy by design principles implemented

United States:
‚Ä¢ Compliance with applicable state and federal laws
‚Ä¢ CCPA and other state privacy law compliance

Other Jurisdictions:
‚Ä¢ Local privacy law compliance where applicable
‚Ä¢ Regular review of regulatory changes

We ensure that international transfers meet the highest standards of data protection.
privacy.section8Content:
[ES] Types of Cookies:

Essential Cookies:
‚Ä¢ Required for platform functionality
‚Ä¢ Authentication and security features
‚Ä¢ Shopping cart and session management

Performance Cookies:
‚Ä¢ Analytics and usage statistics
‚Ä¢ Platform performance monitoring
‚Ä¢ Error tracking and debugging

Functional Cookies:
‚Ä¢ User preferences and settings
‚Ä¢ Language and localization
‚Ä¢ Enhanced user experience features

Marketing Cookies:
‚Ä¢ Advertising and promotional content
‚Ä¢ User behavior analysis
‚Ä¢ Targeted marketing communications

Cookie Management:

‚Ä¢ Cookie consent banner on first visit
‚Ä¢ Granular control over cookie categories
‚Ä¢ Easy opt-out mechanisms
‚Ä¢ Regular review of cookie usage

You can manage cookie preferences through your browser settings or our cookie management tools.
privacy.section9Content:
[ES] Age Restrictions:

‚Ä¢ Our platform is not intended for children under 16
‚Ä¢ We do not knowingly collect information from children
‚Ä¢ Business accounts require adult verification

Parental Rights:

‚Ä¢ Parents can request information about their child's account
‚Ä¢ Right to review and delete child's information
‚Ä¢ Notification of data collection from children

If we discover we have collected information from a child without parental consent, we will delete that information immediately.
privacy.section10Content:
[ES] Integrated Services:

Payment Processing:
‚Ä¢ Secure payment gateways
‚Ä¢ PCI DSS compliant processors
‚Ä¢ Limited data sharing for transaction processing

Shipping and Logistics:
‚Ä¢ International shipping partners
‚Ä¢ Tracking and delivery services
‚Ä¢ Customs and compliance data

Analytics and Marketing:
‚Ä¢ Website analytics providers
‚Ä¢ Marketing automation tools
‚Ä¢ Customer relationship management systems

Third-Party Policies:

‚Ä¢ Each service has its own privacy policy
‚Ä¢ We vet partners for privacy compliance
‚Ä¢ Limited data sharing for specific purposes
‚Ä¢ Regular review of third-party practices

We are not responsible for the privacy practices of third-party services. Users should review third-party privacy policies before using integrated services.
privacy.section11Content:
[ES] Policy Updates:

‚Ä¢ We may update this privacy policy periodically
‚Ä¢ Significant changes will be communicated via email
‚Ä¢ Updated policies will be posted on our website
‚Ä¢ Previous versions are available upon request

Notification Process:

‚Ä¢ Email notification for material changes
‚Ä¢ Website banner for important updates
‚Ä¢ Account notification for significant changes
‚Ä¢ 30-day notice for substantial modifications

User Rights:

‚Ä¢ Right to review updated policies
‚Ä¢ Option to accept or reject changes
‚Ä¢ Ability to close account if disagreeing with changes
‚Ä¢ Continued use constitutes acceptance

We encourage users to review our privacy policy regularly to stay informed about our practices.
privacy.section12Content:
[ES] Data Protection Officer:

Email: privacy@fruithabibi.com
Phone: +1 (555) 123-4567
Address: Data Protection Office, Fruit Habibi Inc., 123 Business Plaza, Suite 456, San Francisco, CA 94105, USA

General Privacy Inquiries:

Email: support@fruithabibi.com
Help Center: /help
Contact Form: /contact

Legal Requests:

Email: legal@fruithabibi.com
For law enforcement and legal process requests

Response Times:

‚Ä¢ General inquiries: 48 hours
‚Ä¢ Privacy rights requests: 30 days
‚Ä¢ Legal requests: As required by law
‚Ä¢ Security incidents: 72 hours for notification

We are committed to addressing all privacy concerns promptly and thoroughly.
